android.car.user

类 ExperimentalCarUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.user.ExperimentalCarUserManager
  • 已过时。 
    ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported. It will be marked @Removed in VIC and hard removed in X.

    @Deprecated
public final class ExperimentalCarUserManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Temporary class containing CarUserManager features that are not ready yet.

    New instances are created through #from(CarUserManager).

    • 方法详细资料

      • createDriver

        @Deprecated
public AndroidFuture<UserCreationResult> createDriver(java.lang.String name,
                                                                   boolean admin)
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Creates a driver who is a regular user and is allowed to login to the driving occupant zone.
        参数:
        name - The name of the driver to be created.
        admin - Whether the created driver will be an admin.
        返回:
        an AndroidFuture that can be used to track operation's completion and retrieve its result (if any).

      • createPassenger

        @Deprecated
public int createPassenger(java.lang.String name,
                                        int driverId)
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Creates a passenger who is a profile of the given driver.
        参数:
        name - The name of the passenger to be created.
        driverId - User id of the driver under whom a passenger is created.
        返回:
        user id of the created passenger, or INVALID_USER_ID if the passenger could not be created.

      • switchDriver

        @Deprecated
public AndroidFuture<UserSwitchResult> switchDriver(int driverId)
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Switches a driver to the given user.
        参数:
        driverId - User id of the driver to switch to.
        返回:
        an AndroidFuture that can be used to track operation's completion and retrieve its result (if any).

      • getAllDrivers

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAllDrivers()
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Returns all drivers who can occupy the driving zone. Guest users are included in the list.
        返回:
        the list of user ids who can be a driver on the device.

      • getPassengers

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPassengers(int driverId)
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Returns all passengers under the given driver.
        参数:
        driverId - User id of a driver.
        返回:
        the list of user ids who are passengers under the given driver.

      • startPassenger

        @Deprecated
public boolean startPassenger(int passengerId,
                                           int zoneId)
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Assigns the passenger to the zone and starts the user if it is not started yet.
        参数:
        passengerId - User id of the passenger to be started.
        zoneId - Zone id to which the passenger is assigned.
        返回:
        true if the user is successfully started or the user is already running. Otherwise, false.

      • stopPassenger

        @Deprecated
public boolean stopPassenger(int passengerId)
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        Stops the given passenger.
        参数:
        passengerId - User id of the passenger to be stopped.
        返回:
        true if successfully stopped, or false if failed.

      • onCarDisconnected

        @Deprecated
public void onCarDisconnected()
        已过时。 ExperimentalCarUserManager was an experimental feature and is no longer supported.
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
